column5: The Spring Fishing & Boat Show is running this Friday through Monday (Feb 14th - 17th) at the International Centre in Mississauga. https://www.springfishingandboatshow.com Looks to be a pretty cool event with lots of speakers, seminars and hand-on stuff. We're a vendor there this year (NILS Master Lures) so if you do go, stop by and say hi. Would love to chat all things fishing!
